question: Name the important tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain.
true_answer: Mausoleum of the Lovers of Teruel, El Torico, and Dinópolis.
asked_question_translated: İspanya, Teruel'deki önemli turistik yerleri sayınız.
answer: Teruel, İspanya'da önemli turistik yerler arasında Mudejar mimarisiyle ünlü Teruel Katedrali, Plaza del Torico, San Pedro Kilisesi ve Torres de San Martín bulunmaktadır.
answer_translated_eng: Important tourist attractions in Teruel, Spain include Teruel Cathedral, famous for its Mudejar architecture, Plaza del Torico, San Pedro Church and Torres de San Martín.
